ValidationRule.description: Covered Pests Other is required if Covered Pests includes Other.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( INCLUDES(Covered_Pests__c, 'Other'), ISBLANK(Covered_Pests_Other__c) ) || AND( NOT(INCLUDES(Covered_Pests__c, 'Other')), NOT(ISBLANK(Covered_Pests_Other__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Covered Pests Other is required if Covered Pests includes Other.
